quotes_en.quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is stong enough.
quotes_en.author: Og Mandino

quotes_en.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes_en.author: Confucius

quotes_en.quote: Always do your best.  What you plant now, you will harvest later.
quotes_en.author: Og Mandino

quotes_en.quote: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up.  The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
quotes_en.author: Thomas Edison

quotes_en.quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
quotes_en.author: Walt Disney

quotes_en.quote: In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can.
quotes_en.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quotes_en.quote: With the new day comes new strenght and new thoughts.
quotes_en.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes_en.quote: The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potential... these are the keys that will unlock the door to personnal excellence.
quotes_en.author: Confucius

quotes_en.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does.  Keep going.
quotes_en.author: Sam Levenson

quotes_en.quote: You have to learn the rules of the game.  And then you have to play better than anyone else.
quotes_en.author: Albert Einstein

quotes_en.quote: Start by doing what's necessary; then do what's possible; and suddenly you are doing the impossible.
quotes_en.author: Francis of Assisi

quotes_en.quote: Set your goals high, and don't stop till you get there.
quotes_en.author: Bo Jackson

quotes_en.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes_en.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes_en.quote: Infuse your life with action. Don't wait for it to happen. Make it happen. Make your own future. Make your own hope. Make your own love. And whatever your beliefs, honor your creator, not by passively waiting for grace to come down from upon high, but by doing what you can to make grace happen... yourself, right now, right down here on Earth.
quotes_en.author: Bradley Whitford

quotes_en.quote: Problems are not stop signs, they are guidelines.
quotes_en.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes_en.quote: Perseverance is failing 19 times and succeeding the 20th.
quotes_en.author: Julie Andrews

quotes_en.quote: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated
quotes_en.author: Maya Angelou

quotes_en.quote: The starting point of all achievement is desire.
quotes_en.author: Napolean Hill
